messages.title: Lib Dem Cuts to Hit Pensioners Hard
messages.content: Labour is fighting council budget cuts from the Lib Dems that threaten services for pensioners in Reading.

messages.title: Tomorrow's Skills and Jobs
messages.content: Labour is committed to our high-tech economy of the future. Labour plan includes guaranteeing a job, education or training for everybody aged 18-24 and creating a million high-tech jobs for the future by investing in green industries.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour invests 13% more in Reading schools.
Protecting the NHS, growing the economy.
Creating new industries, future jobs, and leading on the environment.
Labour believes in a fair future and tackling crime.

issues.education: Labour keen on investing in schools increasing funding per pupil by 13%.
issues.health: Labour is committed to protecting the NHS.

quotes.text: Labour has a great chance to retake control and stop the Conservatives from taking Reading backwards.
Anneliese would be an excellent MP. She knows what it's like for families struggling under this Tory-led Government.

images.caption: Anneliese Dodds - on your side in Reading East
